title: CGC University Mohali Hosts Bharat AI: Pioneering The Future Of Inclusive, Responsible, And Impact-Led Artificial Intelligence
description: New Delhi [India], January 17: In a dazzling celebration of innovation, intellect, and enterprise, CGC University, Mohali proudly hosted Bharat AI: Driving Inclusive, Responsible & Impact-Led Artificial Intelligence, the official pre-summit of the India–AI Impact Summit 2026, on the auspicious occasion of National Startup Day. Sanctioned and recognized by the Ministry of Electronics and Information [...]

title: Fox News AI Newsletter: Data center alarm
description: The Fox News AI Newsletter gives readers the latest AI technology advancements, covering the challenges and opportunities AI presents.

title: The Effort to Stop AI Nudes Is Missing a Deterrent
AI hyperscalers will drive higher US corporate bond supply in 2026, analysts say
description: US corporate bond issuance is expected to increase substantially in 2026, driven ‍in part by AI hyperscaler companies’ build-out needs, analysts forecast. While pent-up M&A activity and a need by companies to ⁠refinance existing debt will likely contribute to higher overall corporate bond issuance this year, the biggest factor will be AI-related funding needs, according [...]

title: Opinion: Remembering Ai, a remarkably intelligent chimpanzee
description: We remember Ai, a highly intelligent chimpanzee who lived at the Primate Research Institute of Kyoto University for most of her life, except the time she escaped and walked around campus.
